Translations.Text: N’abatuza barashikiwe n’abantu bo kwa Fir’auni nawe nyene arimwo
Barahakana	ivyemezo	vyacu	vyose,	kuri	ivyo	twaraba	toteje	nkuko itoteza nyene inguvu n’ubushobozi
Mbega abahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri banyu nibo beranda gusumba abo? canke biranditswe mu bitabu yuko mwebwe muzosirwa
Canke	nibo	bavuga	yuko	twebwe	turi	benshi	kandi	twishoboje	mu kwikingira
Ubwo bwinshi bwabo ubu vuba buzo gendeshwa ningoga	na ningoga hanyuma bahindure imigongo yabo birukanga
Mugabo uwo musi w’imperuka niwo mwanya wabo, no kuri iyo saha izoba igoye cane kandi ibabaza cane
Ntankeka izi nkozi z’ikibi bari mu buzimire n’ubusazi
Umusi	bazo kwegwa bajanwa mu muriro udahera bubitse inda zabo hasi babwirwa bati:- ni muhonje agace gatoyi k’umuriro udahera
Mu vy’ukuri twebwe twaremye ibintu vyose kurugero rukwiye
Ntategeko ryariho atari uko ryari rimwe gusa nk’ugukubita urugohe rumwe gusa
Mu	vy’ukuri	twaramaze	guhonya	bagenzi	banyu,	mugabo	harimwo abibuka
N’ijambo iryariryo ryose bagize riri mu bitabu vyacu
N’ikintu gitoyi canke kininiya vyose biranditswe
Ntankeka aba gamburukira Imana yabo y’ukuri bazoba bari mumirima n’imyonga
Mu	bwicaro	bwiza	buri	mw’Ijuru	ry’Imana,	Umwami	w’ubushobozi bw’ibintu vyose
